about_the_game:
Enter the Ultimate Gunsmith Challenge! Immerse yourself in our adrenaline-pumping gun-building game and test your survival instincts in a battle for supremacy. Your mission? Outlast and outgun as you blaze a trail through new, uncharted maps.

🔧 Craft Your Arsenal: Carefully PICK from an array of 35 mind-bending upgrades. Customize your weaponry to match your strategy and maximize your odds of survival.

🔫 Unleash Your Fury: Lock and load as you SHOOT your way through relentless waves of challenges. Show off your marksmanship and tactical prowess as you fight to stay alive.

🔄 Never-ending Thrills: It's all about the thrill of the hunt! REPEAT the heart-pounding process, honing your skills with every round, and uncovering endless combinations that could secure your spot at the top.

🗺️ Conquer 12 Dynamic Levels: Embark on a gripping journey through 12 intense levels. Each level presents unique trials and opportunities for triumph. Are you up for the challenge?

Survival is the name of the game, and with every shot, you inch closer to mastering the art of gun-building strategy. Can you uncover the winning formula and prove your mettle in the face of relentless adversity? Download now and find out!

name: Pick, shoot, repeat!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Gun-building with 35 upgrades. Easy to control, but hard to master. Endless combinations! How long can you survive?
